def is_fitting_sink(sink:item):
    # Function to check if the sink is suitable for bathing a cat
    symbol has_water_and_recipient=has_water(sink) and recipient(sink)
    return has_water_and_recipient

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists sink: item : is_sink(sink) and is_fitting_sink(sink):
            # Check if there is a sink suitable for washing a cat
            bind sink: item where:
                is_sink(sink) and is_fitting_sink(sink)
            achieve close_char(char, sink)
            # Approach the suitable sink
        else:
            # Check all sinks
            foreach sink: item:
                if is_sink(sink) and not visited(sink):
                    observe(sink, "Check if this sink is suitable for washing a cat")
